body{
  background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,');
  font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
}

.container1{
  display: grid;
  grid-template-areas: 
  "header header header" 
  "main image image"
  "menu1 menu2 menu3"
  "total total total"
  "ordersh ordersh ordersh"
  "orders orders orders"
  "footer footer footer";
  grid-gap: 2px; 
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8); /* semi-transparent white */
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  grid-template-rows: auto 1fr 1fr auto auto 1fr auto;  /* footer always below */
  row-gap: 1rem;                    
}

.header{
  grid-area: header;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center; 
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.menu{
  grid-area: menu1;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.ramen{
  grid-area: menu2;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.soup{
  grid-area: menu3;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.main-area{
  grid-area: main;
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.footer{
  grid-area: footer;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column; 
  justify-content: center; 
  align-items: center; 
  border: 5px solid black; 
}

.image{
  grid-area: image;
  border: 5px solid black; 
  object-fit: fill;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.image img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

.menu-item{
  display: flex;
}

.menu-item button{
  margin-top: 10px; 
  margin-left: 5px; 
  height: 50%; 
}

.total{
  display: flex; 
  grid-area: total; 
  border: 5px solid black; 
  justify-content: space-between; 
}

.orders .scroll-box{
  max-height: 160px;      /* box height */
  overflow-y: auto;       /* shows scrollbar when needed */
  padding: 12px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: #fff;
  width: 100%;  
}

.orders{
  display: flex; 
  grid-area: orders; 
}

#ordersheading{
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center; 
  grid-area: ordersh; 
  border: 5px solid black; 
}
